wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
wines.description: A full-bodied red wine with rich flavors of blackcurrant, cherry, and oak.

wines.name: Chardonnay
wines.description: A crisp white wine with notes of apple, citrus, and vanilla.

wines.name: Merlot
